title: Weird mouse and camera issues in game
body:
I have had frequent issues with league settings changing on me in game. The shop window will be resized back to default, items will be on normal cast and the quickbind UI will have been enabled. I've been fine with changing these back to what I like because it's quite easy to do but today I've had a few issues with my camera that I can not figure out. 

Normally I play with a locked camera and if I click and hold on the minimap my camera will snap to that location and allow me to drag around viewing the map and then snap back to my champion when I let go of the mouse button. This hasn't been working for me at all today. I tried playing without a locked camera but I still couldn't click on the minimap and have my camera snap to that location, I had to hold my mouse at the edges of the screen to slowly scroll across the map. Additionally, the scroll wheel hasn't been working in any menu at all.

I've found it really hard to play the game with these issues so I would really appreciate some help.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try the following to reset your configuration to default.

* Login to the client (which syncs your settings with the server)
* Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
* Delete the "PersistedSettings.json", "game.cfg" & "input.ini" files.
* Launch a custom game
* Exit the custom game
* Exit the client
